alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:11PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kit Carson County through 445 PM MDT... At 407 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Flagler, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea to penny size hail. Accumulating hail possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous travel conditions are likely along Interstate 70 between Flagler and Seibert. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Flagler around 420 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 390 and 410. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
